typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as long,
		MODULE_ID as long,
		OUTLET_ID as string,
		MIGRATION_STATUS as string,
		DATE_TILL_DATA_MIGRATED as timestamp,
		IS_ACTIVE as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DmsModuleOutletMapping
source(output(
		ID as long,
		OUTLET_ID as string,
		OUTLET_NAME as string,
		OUTLET_PILOTED_DATE as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DmsOutlets
source(output(
		ID as long,
		MODULE_ID as long,
		SEQUENCE_ID as integer,
		SRC_COLLECTION_NAME as string,
		TRG_SCHEMA_NAME as string,
		TRG_TABLE_NAME as string,
		DATA_MAPPING_JSON as string,
		WATERMARK_TYPE as string,
		WATERMARK_DATE_SRC_COLUMN_NAME as string,
		WATERMARK_INT_SRC_COLUMN_NAME as string,
		WATERMARK_DATE_TRG_COLUMN_NAME as string,
		WATERMARK_INT_TRG_COLUMN_NAME as string,
		MAPPING_KEY as string,
		BATCH_SIZE as integer,
		POST_COPY_PROC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ModuleToCollectionMappings
DmsOutlets filter(OUTLET_PILOTED_DATE<=currentTimestamp()) ~> FilterPilotedOutlets
DmsModuleOutletMapping filter(MIGRATION_STATUS == 'OPEN') ~> FilterActiveModuleOutletMappings
FilterActiveModuleOutletMappings, FilterPilotedOutlets join(DmsModuleOutletMapping@OUTLET_ID == DmsOutlets@OUTLET_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinModulePilotedOutlets
JoinModulePilotedOutlets, ModuleToCollectionMappings join(DmsModuleOutletMapping@MODULE_ID == ModuleToCollectionMappings@MODULE_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinPilotedOutletModuleCollection
JoinPilotedOutletModuleCollection select(mapColumn(
		MODULE_ID = DmsModuleOutletMapping@MODULE_ID,
		OUTLET_ID = DmsModuleOutletMapping@OUTLET_ID,
		MIGRATION_STATUS,
		DATE_TILL_DATA_MIGRATED,
		IS_ACTIVE,
		OUTLET_NAME,
		OUTLET_PILOTED_DATE,
		SEQUENCE_ID,
		SRC_COLLECTION_NAME,
		TRG_SCHEMA_NAME,
		TRG_TABLE_NAME,
		DATA_MAPPING_JSON,
		WATERMARK_TYPE,
		WATERMARK_DATE_SRC_COLUMN_NAME,
		WATERMARK_INT_SRC_COLUMN_NAME,
		WATERMARK_DATE_TRG_COLUMN_NAME,
		WATERMARK_INT_TRG_COLUMN_NAME,
		MAPPING_KEY,
		BATCH_SIZE,
		POST_COPY_PROC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectActiveMappings
SelectActiveMappings sort(asc(MODULE_ID, true),
	asc(OUTLET_ID, true),
	asc(SEQUENCE_ID, true)) ~> SortActiveMappings
SortActiveMappings sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> PilotedOutletModuleCollectionsSink
